# blastshield_endpoint (Resource)

Manages a Blastshield endpoint.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `enabled` (Boolean)
- `name` (String)
- `node_id` (String)

### Optional

- `address` (String)
- `api_access` (Boolean)
- `default_gw` (Boolean)
- `dns_name` (Set of String)
- `endpoint` (String)
- `groups` (Attributes List) Group memberships with optional expiry. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--groups))
- `tags` (Map of String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedatt--groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `groups`

Required:

- `id` (Number) Group ID.

Optional:

- `expires` (Number) Expiry timestamp (0 = never).
